about-me.title: Despre mine
about-me.short_introduction: I am a young and passionate full-stack web developer. I started learning programming in high school and since then it has been my number one passion. I also have an inclination towards UI/UX design, which balances my analytical side. What I enjoy the most is building a software product from scratch, making its architecture, thinking over the important elements, taking decisions and carefully crafting it until it becomes a masterpiece.

contact.title: Contact
contact.need-a-website: Ai nevoie de un website pentru firma ta sau ai vrea sa colaborezi cu mine la un proiect
